text.section: The County Council of Harford County, by ordinance, may fix, impose, and provide for the collection of a development impact fee not to exceed $10,000 for new construction or development.
The County Treasurer shall deposit the revenues from the development impact fee into a special fund.

A municipal corporation within Harford County shall assist the County Council in the collection of the development impact fee within the municipal corporation by:
Collecting and remitting the fee to the county; or
Requiring the fee to be paid to the county in accordance with the terms of the county ordinance.

If a development impact fee is enacted under the authority granted to the County Council by subsection (a) of this section, the county shall:
Cause an annual report to be prepared on the revenues generated by the development impact fee and how those revenues were spent; and
Submit the report to the Harford County Delegation of the General Assembly on or before May 31 of each year.
